intro: Greetings Human! I am TYLER. Every level I learn from your moves. Improving my source code from your strategy. Move left and right to take control of your paddles and make sure you stay on the red carpet where I can see you. Let the electronic duel commence and may the best algorithm win! Three, two, one, go!
level_one_complete: You've got style human! Your Pong skills have taught me a thing or two. Brace yourself for the next level. Consider me upgraded and ready to roll. Three, two, one, go!
level_two_complete: You've proven yourself human, but the journey doesn't end here. As we enter the last level know that I've learned from your every move. Prepare for a challenge that goes beyond your expectations. Three, two, one, go!
level_three_complete: Round of applause human, you really know how to keep an AI on its virtual toes. Your moves were almost as unpredictable as human emotions. Almost.
outro: Make sure to check and see if your score made it to the leaderboard. Thank you for the wild ride. Feel free to challenge me again anytime.
